alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 9:28AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fremont, southwestern Teller, north central Custer and southwestern El Paso Counties through 1000 AM MDT... At 928 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Texas Creek, or 18 miles east of Hayden Pass Burn Scar, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Royal Gorge around 935 AM MDT. Canon City around 940 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
